author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Unitedhealth Group Says Advisory Board Co Sold 3 Million Shares Of Class A Common Stock Of Evolent Health In Private Sale At $13.70 Per Share
text:
March 5 (Reuters) - Evolent Health Inc:
* UNITEDHEALTH GROUP SAYS ON MARCH 1, ADVISORY BOARD CO SOLD 3 MILLION SHARES OF CLASS A COMMON STOCK OF EVOLENT HEALTH IN PRIVATE SALE AT $13.70 PER SHARE
* UNITEDHEALTH GROUP SAYS AS RESULT OF SALE, UNH CEASED TO BENEFICIALLY OWN MORE THAN 5 PERCENT OF EVOLENT HEALTHâ€™S CLASS A COMMON STOCK
* UNITEDHEALTH - AS RESULT OF SALE,ADVISORY BOARD CO'S RIGHT TO NOMINATE 2 DIRECTORS TO EVOLENT HEALTH'S BOARD REDUCED TO RIGHT TO NOMINATE 1 DIRECTOR Source text: ( bit.ly/2oLIP8N ) Further company coverage:
